posts.description: Lots of techies where asking for a deployment tool for Angular 2 applications. Angular 2 loves Webpack. Webpack is a popular module bundler, a tool for bundling application source code in convenient chunks and for loading that code from a server into a browser.

posts.description: Congratulations. From this day forward, you will no longer squander your time trying to work out the perfect regex to validate email…

You asked for video tutorials...you got 'em! 

Today we are excited to introduce Cracking the Coding Interview Tutorial series by Gayle Laakmann McDowell

A free set of tutorials on HackerRank going through major concepts (big O, data structures, algorithms, etc) for your interviews. http://bit.ly/2dhgYsv

posts.message:
I think a few people here showed interest in attending this year's Web Summit in Lisbon - I "have" 2 free, regular tickets. 

Catch:
- No flight/hotel provided.
- You'll have to buy the hotel package from their website.

I can't afford that right now, so I'm giving them away to someone who can. You'll have to send me the hotel confirmation number so I can forward it to them, though.

Greetings, 
Anyone here has a master's or knowledge in AI ? I'm thinking about specializing in such field and i want to know everything about it. Also if I want to do my masters in AI how much would that cost me in Europe Canada or Australia ? And what are the prerequisites
